https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5c3VdM004UKAkeONoXaEtIknIYT.jpg Charlotte is cheating on Micha with Mélodie. Not suspecting a thing, yet feeling neglected, Micha in turn cheats on Charlotte. But also with Mélodie. For Mélodie, things are topsy-turvy. She lies to both of them. She is privy to each of their lies. And is in love with both of them at the same time. All About Them
